p: In recent years, there has been a growing interest in the potential use of EOs in the food and cosmetics industries. Although EOs are often used in the industry as flavoring agents, these natural products possess a broad range of antimicrobial properties for food preservation. For instance, some EOs, alone or in combination with commercial antibiotics, have shown promising results against multiâˆ’resistant bacteria [ 17, 18]. In addition, several studies have reported the activity of EOs against pathogens that cause foodborne diseases, suggesting their applications in the food industry [ 16].
